headline: Is Axon Enterprise Still Attractive After Its Huge Multi Year Share Price Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Axon Enterprise is still worth buying after its huge run up, or if the smart move now is to wait for a better entry point, you are not alone. The stock has pulled back about 11.5% over the last year despite gaining 227.6% over three years and 373.9% over five years. This mix hints at both powerful long term momentum and shifting near term sentiment. Recently, Axon has stayed in the headlines as police departments and government agencies continue adopting its...

headline: How New Long-Term AI Police Tech Contracts Could Shape Axon Enterprise’s (AXON) Investment Story
summary: In late November and early December 2025, Axon Enterprise secured two long-term police technology contracts, including a nine-year, US$14.3 million deal with Rialto, California, and a 10-year, US$10.6 million agreement with Kennewick, Washington, to deploy AI-enabled body cameras, software, and drone solutions. These contracts showcase growing adoption of Axon’s integrated, AI-powered hardware and software bundles by U.S. law enforcement agencies, underpinning demand for its expanding public...

headline: LVT Appoints Three C-Suite Executives to Support Rapid Company Growth
summary: AMERICAN FORK, Utah, Dec. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LVT (LiveView Technologies, Inc.), the leader of rapidly deployable security solutions, today announced three new executive leadership appointments: George Bentinck, Chief Product Officer, will lead LVT’s product strategy as it executes on the vision for actionable intelligence for the physical world. Bentinck most recently served as Vice President of Product Management, IoT and Edge Intelligence, at Cisco Meraki.Arvind Bobra, Chief Financia
